hibernate-mapping.query: Select mbDetails.workOrderActivity.id,sum(mbDetails.quantity) from MBDetails mbDetails where mbDetails.mbHeader.workOrderEstimate.id=? and mbDetails.mbHeader.state.previous.value = 'APPROVED' group by mbDetails.workOrderActivity

from WorkOrderActivity woe where woe.workOrderEstimate.id=? and woe.workOrderEstimate.workOrder.state.previous.value!='CANCELLED' and woe.id not in (Select distinct(mbDetails.workOrderActivity.id) from MBDetails mbDetails where mbDetails.mbHeader.workOrderEstimate.id=? and mbDetails.mbHeader.state.previous.value = 'APPROVED')

Select sum(woa.approvedQuantity) from WorkOrderActivity woa where woa.workOrderEstimate.workOrder.tenderNumber=? AND woa.workOrderEstimate.workOrder.state.previous.value !='CANCELLED' group by woa.activity having woa.activity.id = ?

Select sum(woa.approvedQuantity) from WorkOrderActivity woa where woa.workOrderEstimate.workOrder.tenderNumber=? AND woa.workOrderEstimate.workOrder.state.value ='NEW' group by woa.activity having woa.activity.id = ?
Select sum(woa.approvedQuantity) from WorkOrderActivity woa where woa.workOrderEstimate.workOrder.negotiationNumber=? AND woa.workOrderEstimate.workOrder.state.previous.value !='CANCELLED'
Select sum(woa.approvedQuantity) from WorkOrderActivity woa where woa.workOrderEstimate.workOrder.negotiationNumber=? AND woa.workOrderEstimate.workOrder.state.value ='NEW'
from TenderResponseLine trl where trl.id in(:param_0)
select sum(woa.approvedQuantity) from WorkOrderActivity woa where woa.workOrderEstimate.estimate.parent.id=? and woa.workOrderEstimate.workOrder.egwStatus.code !='CANCELLED'

from WorkOrderActivity woa where id in (select mbd.workOrderActivity.id from MBDetails mbd where (mbd.mbHeader.createdDate < (select createdDate from MBHeader where id = ?) or (select count(*) from MBHeader where id = ?) = 0 ) and mbd.mbHeader.state.previous.value != 'CANCELLED') and (woa.activity.id=? or (woa.activity.parent is not null and woa.activity.parent.id=? )) and woa.workOrderEstimate.estimate.id in(:param_4) order by woa.id
